CatDescriptText: Mr. William Hardy, Webster Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 18, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think the Federal Government should immediately enforce the Supreme Court's recent decision in 'Little Rock School Case' or permit the recalcitrant states to take their time in obeying?" answer reads: "I don't think it should take time. I feel that after 90 years it is time to start right now."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of William Hardy wearing plaid hat, eyeglasses, and moustache, standing on Liberty Avenue across from Heffer's Jewelers and General Office Equipment Corp., Downtown
